summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 12, replat of J.J. McGilvra's 3rd Addition, being the alley between 42nd Avenue North and 43rd Avenue North, from East Garfield Street to East Blaine Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9712 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
